title: Video games are most fun when everybody sucks and nobody knows what's going on
body:
This has been true for my entire life 

First Mario Party, then Dark Alliance, then Soulcalibur, then Halo, then Call of Duty, then every other multiplayer game I've ever played

When I know what's going on, I'm actually competitive about it, and it stops being fun

Even stupid shit like DS download play on Metroid Prime: Hunters or Lunar Knights (outstanding, incredible games btw) stopped being fun once I had an idea on how it worked
